txt.en: A group of goblin raiders camp within the old ruins of Stramvárth for the night….\n\nYour mission is to ambush a group of raiders camped at Stramvárth for the night.
You have been tasked with ambushing a group of raiders camped at Stramvárth for the night.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts were passing by Stramvárth, where they noticed a group of goblins who have set up camp within the ruins. These goblins must be removed if we are to keep the Floodfells safe for those who dwell there.'
You must find a way to breach a barrier to reach your mission objective.
Your mission is to ambush a group of raiders camped at Stramvárth for the night.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Stramvárth.

'Well done! With the goblins sent running, the Floodfells continue to be safe! It is important to keep the Beornings safe and fighting with us, for they are a good ally to have in our quest to reclaim Gundabad.'
